Package information

Basic information about the package

huxtable-package

Huxtable: simply create LaTeX and HTML tables

Creating and manipulating huxtables

Functions to create, subset and work with huxtables

[.huxtable

Subset a huxtable

add_colnames add_rownames

Add column or row names

add_footnote

Add a row with a footnote

cbind rbind

Combine rows or columns

huxtable hux as_huxtable as_hux is_huxtable is_hux

Create a huxtable

insert_column insert_row

Insert a row or column

mutate

Dplyr verbs for huxtable

t

Transpose a huxtable

Size and position

Size and position properties of huxtables

col_width col_width<- set_col_width

Column widths

height height<- set_height

Table height

position position<- set_position

Table position

row_height row_height<- set_row_height

Row heights

width width<- set_width

Table width

Table-level properties

Other table-level properties of huxtables

caption caption<- set_caption

Caption

caption_pos caption_pos<- set_caption_pos

Caption position

label label<- set_label

Table label

latex_float latex_float<- set_latex_float

Float position for LaTeX

tabular_environment tabular_environment<- set_tabular_environment

Tabular environment

Text properties

Functions to change the properties of text in table cells

bold bold<- set_bold italic italic<- set_italic

Cell text style

font font<- set_font

Font

font_size font_size<- set_font_size

Font size

number_format number_format<- set_number_format

Number format

na_string na_string<- set_na_string

NA string

align align<- set_align

Alignment

text_color text_color<- set_text_color

Text color

Borders and padding

Functions to alter borders, border colors and cell padding

left_border_color left_border_color<- set_left_border_color right_border_color right_border_color<- set_right_border_color top_border_color top_border_color<- set_top_border_color bottom_border_color bottom_border_color<- set_bottom_border_color

Border colors

left_border left_border<- set_left_border right_border right_border<- set_right_border top_border top_border<- set_top_border bottom_border bottom_border<- set_bottom_border

Borders

left_padding left_padding<- set_left_padding right_padding right_padding<- set_right_padding bottom_padding bottom_padding<- set_bottom_padding top_padding top_padding<- set_top_padding set_all_padding

Cell padding

set_all_borders

Set all borders

set_all_border_colors

Set all border colors

set_outer_borders

Set outer borders round a rectangle of cells

Alignment

Background color

Column span

Property manipulation

Generic ways to manipulate huxtable properties

get_default_properties

Get default huxtable properties

set_cell_properties

Set multiple cell properties

set_default_properties

Set default huxtable properties

Output

Functions to outut huxtables to LaTeX, HTML, Word, Excel, markdown or on-screen

as_FlexTable as_flextable

Convert a huxtable for Word/Powerpoint

as_Workbook

Convert a huxtable for Excel

guess_knitr_output_format

Guess knitr output format

print_html to_html print_notebook

Create HTML representing a huxtable

print_latex to_latex

Create LaTeX representing a huxtable

print_md to_md

Create Markdown representing a huxtable

print_screen to_screen

Print a huxtable on screen

print

Default print method for huxtables

report_latex_dependencies

Report LaTeX dependencies

quick_pdf quick_html quick_docx quick_xlsx

Quickly create a PDF, HTML, Word or Excel document showing matrices, data frames, et cetera.

Themes

Quick ways to theme a huxtable

theme_plain theme_basic theme_striped theme_article

Theme a huxtable

Row specs

Ways to specify rows and columns in set_ functions

every everywhere evens odds

Return every n row or column numbers

final

Return the last n rows or columns

rowspecs

Row and column specifications

where

Return array indices where expression is true

Miscellaneous

Other functions

hux_logo

Huxtable logo

huxreg

Create a huxtable to display model output

is_a_number

Does an object look like a number?

sanitize

Sanitize table elements
